# Test files excluded from auto-triggered CI tests.
# These tests use LakeflowConnectTester which requires real API credentials
# and cannot run in CI without proper secrets configured.
#
# Remove a test file from this list to enable auto-triggered testing for it.
# Lines starting with '#' and blank lines are ignored.
